name: ballon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large, round glass, usually used for drinking brandy (= a strong alcoholic drink): He was leaning back in his chair with a ballon of brandy and a cigar. Shake all ingredients and double strain into a brandy ballon with ice.
More examplesFewer examplesHe quickly knocked back a ballon of brandy.He looked at us over the top of his brandy ballon.Fat wine ballons brimming with bottled mineral water sit by each place setting.
